name: Chimenea
description:
controls: 

  • Enter to switch between players and to start the game
  • Left/Right/Up/Down arrows to move
  • At game end press Z to start a new game

objective:

  • move each player to safety by moving them out of the path of the murderer, while the light (except the fireplace light) flickers on and off
  • score a maximum 5 point score

Certain browsers like firefox may require zooming in, use `CTRL +` to zoom in.

Smaller screens may require zooming out, use `CTRL -` to zoom out.

To see source (AGPL licensed):

git clone https://koreyhinton.org/git/chimenea.git
